text: Mard aurton per haakim hain iss waja say kay Allah Taalaa ney aik ko doosray per fazilat di hai aur iss waja say kay mardon ney apney maal kharach kiye hain pus nek farman bardaar aurten khawind ki adam mojoodgi mein ba hifazat-e-elahee nigehdasht rakhen waliyan hain aur jin aurton ki na farmani aur bad dimaghi ka tumhen khof ho unhen naseehat kero aur unhen alag biostaron per chor do aur unhen maar ki saza do phir agar woh tabey daari keren to unn per koi raasta talash na kero be-shak Allah Taalaa bari bulandi aur baraee wala hai
